name: Caton's Revenge
description:
At the last time of this year, it's our turn. (FutePen)
　Fute&Kuma has revived!!!

　Though, this is Caton's app...

　KechonKechon Fute&Kuma with Caton's cat traps and elixirs.

　If you fail, Caton will be KechonKechoned.

　Caton, I'll see it!! (This is Catol.)

　And, how will PanDA act？？？

　Caton is the leading part.
